title: API Mandatory Test - Playwright Framework
description: This project aims to perform API request body testing. It focuses on validating API body values ​​to ensure they meet specified requirements and function correctly.

title: SwagsLab - Playwright Framework
description: This project aims to study and implement a Robot framework. It focuses on automating test cases for the Swagslab web application using the Playwright Framework, a popular open-source test automation framework.

title: SauceDemo - Robot Framework
description: This project aims to study and implement a Robot framework. It focuses on automating test cases for the SauceDemo web application using the Robot Framework, a popular open-source test automation framework.
